sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This script include is for DemandThouShall Utils</description>
        <name>wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall = Class.create();
wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

	/*@name isThouShall
    @description it checks whether its thoushall Record
    @param Demand Record
    @returns boolen value*/

    isThouShall: function(dmnRec) {
        var asmtRec = new GlideRecord('u_assessment_results');
        asmtRec.addQuery('u_demand.sys_id', dmnRec.getValue('sys_id'));
        asmtRec.addNullQuery('u_parent');
        asmtRec.query();
        if (asmtRec.next()) {
            return asmtRec.getValue('u_is_this_a_pre_authorized_change')
        }

    },

    type: 'wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K098414</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-18 09:19:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3f76fac687667110b00263130cbb35a5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>wfSPMCMSDemandThouShall</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3f76fac687667110b00263130cbb35a5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>K098414</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-20 08:20:05</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
